name: Flappy Blocks
description:
Flappy Bird plus Tetris, and quite the story mode. If you  collide with anything, your piece slides into position - no rotating after!

This is a Compo entry for Ludum Dare 41, which means that all assets were created by me in 48 hours.  Its page is here!

If you liked this, please follow my Twitter and/or blog, where I'll be documenting interesting parts of the creation and whatever I make next.

Very useful thingies that made it possible:

  • PixelCamera2D
  • Tonematrix
  • The chap who wrote a pixel-perfect font fix for Unity
  • Friend Joshua, who helped with expert Unity guidance while making his own compo entry
